mapper.select: SELECT D.ID AS ID,D.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID,P.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECT_NAME,D.DEMAND_NAME AS DEMAND_NAME, D.DEMAND_DESCRIBE AS DEMAND_DESCRIBE,D.VERSION AS VERSION,D.PUT_TIME AS PUT_TIME,D.PUT_USERID AS PUT_USERID, D.EXCEPT_END_TIME AS EXCEPT_END_TIME,D.ACTUAL_END_TIME AS ACTUAL_END_TIME,D.COMPLETE_USERID AS COMPLETE_USERID, (CASE WHEN D.DEMAND_STATUS='0' THEN '开发中' ELSE '已完成' END ) as DEMAND_STATUS FROM DEMAND D,PROJECT P WHERE D.PROJECT_ID=P.ID AND D.ID=#{id}
